code: import axios from"@helpers/axios/public.axios";import{AUTH}from"../../constants";export const createDemoUser=()=>async dispatch=>{try{const response=await axios.post("/register/demo");const{user,token}=response.data.data;dispatch({type:AUTH.AUTH_RESPONSE,payload:{user,token,isDemoUser:true}});return{user,token};}catch(e){dispatch({type:AUTH.AUTH_ERROR,payload:e.response.data.message});throw e;}};
